Alma Gémea

Advertising campaign for the Alma Gémea pottery brand of the Amorim Cork Composites Group.

The video followed the theme of the collection: the four seasons of the year in fusion with the four elements (fire, water, air and earth), which in their fusion form a fifth element - the cork.

Amorim Cork Composites
